traits.name: Life Hunger
entries: If a creature within 60 feet of the sorrowsworn regains hit points, the sorrowsworn gains two benefits until the end of its next turn: it has advantage on attack rolls, and its Bite deals an extra 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage on a hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sorrowsworn makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 16), and it is {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. While grappling a creature, the sorrowsworn can't make a Claw attack.
